item.title: Write the Query Letter First
item.description: Picture your future. You’ve written your masterpiece. You’re ready to find an agent who can sell your book to Hachette or Tor or whatever. What do you do next?

item.title: Intro to Independent Author Mailing Lists
item.description: The only thing harder than writing a book is selling a book. I enjoy reading what I wrote, and I think others will too. But helping people to find it in the crowded world of independent publishing? Tricky.
